Text: Hmmm... I can see you people connected on my client... but no one is downloading... I'mma see what I can do... probably something stupid on the firewall...
All right, seems to be working now =)
Thx alot, couple of tracks aren't bad at all for a strategy game.

Thanks alot, I've been looking for this.

Awesome songs btw.

1+
Would've been nice if someone finally uploaded steam or original release of settlers 7 -_-

@Celarion
Someone has to come up with a work-around for Ubisoft's new system. Currently you need to have an Ubisoft account and register the game's key to your account, and have an active internet connection to play because it constantly checks for legitimacy. When someone finds a work around for this, I'm sure people will upload the game.

CarnageHeart thank you very much for this soundtracks , music is nice , but what about tags or names of performers , i dl it but files are with out any info about performers when i play it in JetAudio or any other players ??? there is just a name of the song ? once again thank you. and the game is great ;)

@Levcanin
Like I said in the info, this is how I received the soundtrack through steam, so that's how I gave it to you guys. Any changes you want made to it, such as wav to mp3, or adding in information for the composers etc. is up to you to do if that's what you really want.
